heisigStory: To blow is really no more than a deliberate effort to make one's mouth lack all the air that is in it.
hint: blowing the lungs empty of air
koohiiStory1: This is clearly a BLOWJOB, we can see the MOUTH and the LACK OF condom. (I am sorry for the image, but it sticks forever in your mind).
koohiiStory2: I keep confusing this with suck (#689). Consider someone blowing bubbles using their chewing gum because they´re lacking attention in class.
myStory: chữ Xuy, xúy. thổi. thiếu hơi thì thổi miệng
words:
吹奏(すいそう): playing wind instruments
吹雪(ふぶき): snow storm
吹く(ふく): blow (wind, etc.), emit
